messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 150
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:58:00 AM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: has made our lives more pleasant. It s pulled a cold
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:58:00 AM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
has made our lives more pleasant. It's pulled a cold front down, and we made
a record low of 66 degrees last night. The high today was 83 degrees with LOW
humidity...unheard of in mid-August. I just came home from work and it felt
like OCTOBER out there. Totally awesome. I just wish it didn't come at such a
high price for others. We'll get our turn eventually.....
Same here in Louisiana...made for some absolutely gorgeous weather this
weekend! Everytime a hurricane forms, we watch it like hawks. We haven't had a
major hit in awhile but we always know that it is a very real possiblity every
time. ~Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
